headline: Is Chevron Corporation (CVX) One of the Best Energy Stocks for Passive Income Investors?
summary: Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) is included among the 10 Best Passive Income Stocks to Buy Now. Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) is popular among dividend investors because of its solid cash position. In the first quarter of 2025, the company reported an operating cash flow of $5.2 billion, and its free cash flow came in at $1.3 billion. […]
